short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take gagadget.com’s quirky quiz to predict the world’s end! Engaging tech insights since 2008

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curious about humanity's fate? The "End Times Quiz" by gagadget.com/en/ brings a dash of tech-savvy humor to doomsday predictions!

This quirky extension offers a fun, tongue-in-cheek quiz to "calculate" when the world might end based on your daily habits and observations. From smartphone addiction to extreme weather events, answer eight thought-provoking questions and discover your personalized apocalypse timeline.

Key features:
- Eight humorous questions about modern life
- Instant "calculation" of the world's end date
- Witty responses for each outcome
- No personal data collected or stored

Perfect for:
- Tech enthusiasts with a sense of humor
- Anyone needing a laugh during their browsing session
- Sparking conversations about technology's impact on society

The "End Times Quiz" is brought to you by gagadget.com, your go-to source for insightful, often provocative tech reviews and articles since 2008. We blend cutting-edge technology news with a distinctive, ironic twist.

Install now for a chuckle-inducing break in your day, and don't forget to check out Gagadget.com for more unique, engaging tech content that challenges the status quo!

Disclaimer: For entertainment purposes only. No actual doomsday predictions are being made!
